sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
School Election Validation (1965) Act.

sections.heading: In all cases where prior to the effective date of this Act an
sections.text:
election was held for members of the board of education of a special
charter school district, the validity of such election shall not be
affected by whether the election was conducted by the board of education or
by a board of election commissioners existing within the district.
